entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider avoiding irreducible loops in async codegen #67774
  • Suggested fix to IDE0030 on Nullable Int results in CS0019 #67770
  • Unable to sort `using` directives using type aliases #67768
    Backlog
  • Missing colorization on function pointer types for type aliases #67767
  • Roslyn IDE is flagging Enum objects in a inheriting c# files as an error. #67764

Closed

  • Compiler produces a *lot* of UncommonData instance values possibly unnecessarily. #67717
    17.7

PullRequests

Created

  • Only modify the linked document once in LSP code action #67784
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merges/main to features/interceptors #67782
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Incrementally update dependency graph for new cases #67781
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Switch to TemporaryArrays while topologically sorting graphs #67780
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations of StateForCase instances #67779
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • WIP: Reduce allocations of StateForCase instances. #67778
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Pool node collections in analyzer driver. #67776
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Remove unnecessary Location object allocations when checking lang versions. #67773
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Interactive Window: Flow both culture and UI culture #67771
    Area-Interactive, untriaged

Merged

  • Pool more formatting collections #67777
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Pool node collections in formatter #67775
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Cache constructed Nullable<T> types for built-ins and enums #67766
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Interceptors #67432
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Avoid allocating UncommonData for common failure case #67765
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce Location instance allocations. #67772
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce number of invocations to StateSet.GetOrCreateActiveFileState #67669
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Set current culture when Interactive Window is initialized #67677
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.6-vs-deps #67769
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.6-vs-deps #67763
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Pool lists used when reusing assembly symbols #67744
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Cache AssemblyIdentity instances produced in compiler #67749
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • WIP: Not for review - Merged branch of all perf work. #67730
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid realizing SyntaxReference[] in source methods #67750
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Round-trip extensions via metadata #67530
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Pool 'boxed' helper objects used during constraints checking #67724
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow nested instance member access in `nameof` in static context #67461
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Correct generate rename code action in LSP #67731
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Preserve removed entries in `SyntaxNodeProvider` #67636
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.7
  • Record added node output states as new #66725
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Pool intermediary dictionaries use to create named type and namespace members #67727
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Generate comments as part of Extract Interface #67722
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Defer creation of Location objects to the point they are actually needed. #67742
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Source build fixes #67747
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Generate branchless IL for `(b ? 1 : 0)` #67191
    Area-Compilers
  • Function pointer calling convention IDE support #59062
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Consider ref property and indexer accesses to have home #67736
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Parse pointer to arrays #65432
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.5
  • WIP: Do not allocate conversion objects in common failure path #67760
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
